name: Technical fields by fields of technology in patent data
description: Technical fields by fields of technology in patent data

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: U.S. Patent and Trademark Office patents and international patent families are classified under the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) classification of patents, which classifies International Patent Classification codes under 35 technical fields and five fields of technology.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics; Science-Metrix; International Patent Classification, WIPO, accessed June 2021.Science and Engineering Indicators
